entry.source: {F804,5}Find a bottle of wine and bring it back to me.{F804,0}{F801}I have no clues for you as to its whereabouts,{F801}save that it was handled in large Tokyo shops{F801}known as department stores. It may help to know{F801}that clothing, food, and a wide assortment of{F801}sundries were offered there. Please do your{F801}utmost to find it for the sake of my friend...{F801}
